overview: Widow Susan moonlights as a resort masseuse, her second son Junior is into lapu-lapu fish-raising, while her daughter Lota and husband Dudut are into wine-making. A daily fare, 'resiko' treat, has become a threat to the family's fight for survival.
tagline: A portion of one's salary earned by wine-makers, set aside for a treat or blow-out.
title: Mauban: Ang Resiko
